testsuite.name: create_playlist

testcase.name: Structure de la page Créer une Playlist

failure.message: L'entête existe sur la page in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (519ms)
Le menu de navigation existe dans l'entête in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (516ms)
Le menu de navigation a l'id 'nav-bar' in 500ms - expected "contains 'nav-bar'" but got: "element could not be located" (518ms)
Le menu de navigation a la classe 'flex-column' in 500ms - expected "has flex-column" but got: "element could not be located" (513ms)
Le menu de navigation contient une liste in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (518ms)
La liste a la classe 'flex-column' in 500ms - expected "has flex-column" but got: "element could not be located" (515ms)
Failed [equal]: (Le menu de navigation doit comporter 3 liens.) - expected "3" but got: "0" (0ms)
L'élément 'main' est présent sur la page in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (518ms)
L'élément 'main' a l'id 'main-area' in 500ms - expected "contains 'main-area'" but got: "element could not be located" (515ms)
L'élément 'form' est présent à l'intérieur de l'élément 'main' in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (519ms)
L'élément 'form' possède l'id 'playlist-form' in 500ms - expected "contains 'playlist-form'" but got: "element could not be located" (518ms)
L'élément 'form' a la classe 'form-group' in 500ms - expected "has form-group" but got: "element could not be located" (519ms)
Le pied de page existe in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (522ms)
L'élément 'footer' a l'id 'playing-bar' in 500ms - expected "contains 'playing-bar'" but got: "element could not be located" (520ms)
Failed [equal]: (Le pied de page doit contenir 2 noms) - expected "2" but got: "0" (0ms)

testcase.name: Tests de l'information générale du playlist

failure.message: L'élément 'div' avec l'id 'general-info' est présent dans le formulaire in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (517ms)
L'élément div avec l'id 'general-info' a une classe 'flex-row' in 500ms - expected "has flex-row" but got: "element could not be located" (518ms)
Un élément 'fieldset' se situe à l'intérieur du div qui contient l'id 'general-info' in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (522ms)
Les 'fieldset' contiennent un élément 'legend' in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (520ms)
Failed [equal]: (Le 'fieldset' doit contenir trois div) - expected "3" but got: "0" (0ms)
Les éléments 'div' qui se situent à l'intérieur du 'fieldset' ont comme classes 'form-control flex-row' in 500ms - expected "has form-control flex-row" but got: "element could not be located" (518ms)
Chaque élément 'div' dans le premier fieldset doit contenir un label in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (521ms)
Failed [equal]: (Il doit y avoir un élément 'label' dans chaque élément 'div') - expected "3" but got: "0" (0ms)
description in 500ms - expected "contains 'name'" but got: "element could not be located" (515ms)
Un élément 'input' doit avoir comme id 'name' in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (523ms)
L'élément 'input' utilisé pour déterminer le nom de la playlist est de type 'text' in 500ms - expected "contains 'text'" but got: "element could not be located" (518ms)
Un élément 'input' doit avoir comme id 'description' in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (522ms)
L'élément 'input' utilisé pour déterminer la description de la playlist est de type 'text' in 500ms - expected "contains 'text'" but got: "element could not be located" (525ms)
Un élément 'input' utilisé doit avoir comme id 'image' in 500ms - expected "is present" but got: "not present" (526ms)
L'élément 'input' pour déterminer la description de la playlist est de type 'file' in 500ms - expected "contains 'file'" but got: "element could not be located" (521ms)
L'élément 'input' ne doit accepter que les images in 500ms - expected "contains 'image/*'" but got: "element could not be located" (513ms)
